DOC.brief_summary: The objective of study is to determine the effect of hyaluronic acid on the formation of post-operative adhesions. It will be a randomized control trial comparing the product against normal saline.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Hyaluronic Acid in the Prevention of Post-operative Adhesions: a RCT
DOC.criteria: All consenting patients between the ages of 1280, who undergo exploratory laparotomy and stoma formation Previous history of abdominal surgery History of peritoneal dialysis Patients in whom permanent stoma is formed
